channel.title: Git-Flow on Letters From Iman
channel.description: Recent content in Git-Flow on Letters From Iman

item.title: My First Impression about Code Review
item.description: My first time to know about Code Review is when entering my current company at Kurio. In my past company before here, we never doing any code review. So everything is just passed to staging-branch and if tested well merge directly to master.

item.title: Why You Should Care About Squash and Merge in Git
item.description: We just develop our new feature in Kurio. It is a targeted push notification. More about this you could read it here
